MindFlayer.ambilightEnabledHint: Enables the ambilight to be controlled from this browser
MindFlayer.ambilightTargetHint: Can be an IP address or a E131 Universe
MindFlayer.ambilightUniverseHint: The Universe to which the LEDs belong
MindFlayer.ambilightLEDCountHint: Must be a number between 1 and 170 inclusive
MindFlayer.ambilightOffsetHint: How many times should the array be rotated by one led. Positive numbers shift upwards
MindFlayer.ambilightBrightnessMinHint: Each Color of each LED will be at least this value
MindFlayer.ambilightBrightnessMaxHint: Each Color of each LED will be capped to this value
MindFlayer.websocketHostHint: A websocket server that the module will connect to
MindFlayer.websocketPortHint: The port of the websocket that the module will connect to
MindFlayer.websocketPathHint: The path of the websocket that the module will connect to
MindFlayer.cameraControlHint: This changes the camera behavior when tokens move
MindFlayer.cameraControlFocusPlayers: Automatic (focus all active player tokens on scene)
MindFlayer.moduleEnabledHint: Enables the module for this browser
MindFlayer.Notifications.Error: An error ocurred, look at the log for more information
MindFlayer.Notifications.ConnectionClose: Connected to websocket closed, attempting to reconnect in 5 seconds...
module.MindFlayer.setting.combatIndicato: Duration of the timer between combat rounds, 0 = disabled
Duration of the Timer for the Player to react
module.MindFlayer.StartTimerDialog.title: Start a Timer
module.MindFlayer.StartTimerDialog.field: If the Role is equal to None, Player or Trusted the table LEDs will show the Timer
